interactivity.requirements: Weekends 25 Molly Affection You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen " Technicolored Happiness Explosion " from Rin Rokuhara Seen " Unsleeping Aegis " from Tsuneyo Tojo
interactivity.to_get_this_event: Visit the Koi Cafe at night

progression.synopsis: Sensei talks to Molly about the aftermath of the incident with Rin . Molly admits that she has been losing sleep lately, and that she has been throwing herself into gaming to try to distract herself. She says that the worst part isn't that Rin is with someone else, or that Molly's relationship with Rin will take time to recover — it's the embarrassment. She says for now, she deserves to feel down, but if she ignores her feelings, time will eventually make things better. Molly gets Sensei to help her close up the cafe and walk her back to the dorms, with a stop on the way.

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.20p1.
